titleStmt.title: An extract out of a pastoral letter of the Bishop of Angers in France, concerning a late miracle done in the parish called in French, Des Ulmes de St. Florent, near to the town of Saumur, on the second day of June 1668. At what time those of the reformed church (as they call themselves) held their sinod in the said town of Saumur.
titleStmt.author: Arnauld, Henri, 1597-1692.
Catholic Church. Diocese of Angers (France). Bishop (1649-1692 : Arnauld)

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
